At practice Wednesday, Michael Vick loosened up throwing passes to Falcons quarterback Matt Ryan , who is making his first Pro Bowl appearance in his third season and succeeded Michael Vick in Atlanta. Matt Ryan is great. The coaching staff is great. We're just having a good time, he said.`` I like what they're doing in the offense and it's been easy. We're going to go out and try to have fun and everybody enjoy each other.''

Simon Cowell writes I look upon it[ groveling] as a sign of desperation. So many times people come in and they come up with this terrible dialogue about how much they like me or Randy or Paula. It's demeaning, and there's no point to it. We're not looking for a nice person; we're looking for somebody who's confident and assured, but talented above all. Trust me-- most stars aren't nice. 2.
